item.title: Today‚Äôs Wordle #1611: Hints And Answer For November 16, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a daily player, today‚Äôs tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak‚Äîif you‚Äôre open to a little extra help. So, if you‚Äôve found yourself stuck with today‚Äôs Wordle, don‚Äôt worry, below you‚Äôll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1611 for November 16, 2025.

To play today‚Äôs Wordle, head to the game‚Äôs website. If you want to go right to today‚Äôs answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here. If you‚Äôve missed any days, check out our Wordle Answer Archive for every past answer.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today‚Äôs and yesterday‚Äôs editions of Wordle. If you don‚Äôt want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, November 16, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1611 is likely to challenge most players According to the NY Times Wordle review, today‚Äôs answer takes an average of 4.8 of 6 guesses. That makes it slightly harder than the 4.3 guess average from November 15.

General Wordle Hints For November 16

Without giving today‚Äôs Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • WIDER
  • FIELD
  • WILED

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1611 for November 16, 2025

Starter Words For November 16, 2025

If you want help getting started without having today‚Äôs Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • Hint 1: This word describes using something with purpose, rather than just holding it.
  • Hint 2: You‚Äôll often see it in fantasy, action, or political writing.
  • Hint 3: It commonly appears next to words like ‚Äúpower,‚Äù ‚Äúinfluence,‚Äù or ‚Äúa weapon.‚Äù
  • Hint 4: It suggests control, not just possession.

Today‚Äôs Wordle Answer For Game #1611 On November 16, 2025

If you‚Äôve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today‚Äôs Wordle below.

Answer: WIELD

If you solved today‚Äôs Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow‚Äôs puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today‚Äôs Wordle Answer Mean?

Wield is a verb that has a couple meanings. One definition is to exercise in a ruling a dominating fashion, while the other definition is to use an item effectively.

Yesterday‚Äôs Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here‚Äôs yesterday‚Äôs Wordle answer for Game #1610 on November 15, 2025:

Answer: CLUNG

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1611?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on November 17 will be Wordle Game #1612.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn‚Äôt fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

Need more help with other daily games? Let us know what games you‚Äôd like tips and clues for in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: You Won‚Äôt Unlock The Full Tarkov Flea Market Until Level 40
item.content:encoded:
Escape from Tarkov‚Äôs 1.0 update is here, and fans worldwide are enjoying it ‚Äì or those who can access the game are, anyway. It‚Äôs the dawn of a new era for the stellar extraction shooter, which has grown over the last decade to become a staple of the industry and a leader of the genre.

The 1.0 update brings stacks of changes, and one that players are struggling to contend with concerns the game‚Äôs Flea Market mechanic. It has been discovered that ‚Äòcategories‚Äô of the Flea Market are locked until you progress to a fairly high level.

Flea Market Locked Down Again

The latest changes to Escape from Tarkov have been a mixed bag. On one hand, the new map, faction, weapons, and 1,000 bug fixes are welcome, but the shattered servers that are having issues hosting the hundreds of thousands of players trying to get into the game, we can do without.

One change that‚Äôs proving to be divisive is the alteration made to the game‚Äôs Flea Market, the peer-to-peer trading solution that allows users to buy and sell gear they find, craft, or steal.

With 1.0, players are now being forced to hit minimum level requirements to open up sections of the Flea Market, with certain categories remaining under lock for quite some time. The base Flea Market unlocks at Level 15 as always, but there are higher restrictions now in terms of levels.

Here‚Äôs what we‚Äôve seen so far:

  • Bolt-action rifles ‚Äì Level 20
  • Assault rifles ‚Äì Level 25
  • Marksman rifles ‚Äì Level 25
  • Backpacks ‚Äì Level 25
  • Foregrips ‚Äì Level 20
  • Light and laser devices ‚Äì Level 25
  • Muzzle devices ‚Äì Level 20

It gets a bit more extreme in some places:

  • Barter items ‚Äì Level 30
  • Gear components ‚Äì Level 30
  • Injectors ‚Äì Level 30
  • Keycards ‚Äì Level 30

And some high-tier ammo will remain locked for a very long time:

  • PS12B ‚Äì Level 40
  • M80 ‚Äì Level 35
  • Blackout CJB ‚Äì Level 40

(Thanks to LogicalSolutions for the spot)

This is believed to be an effort to counter cheaters trying to participate in RMT (real-money trading), but it has rubbed some fans the wrong way.

Do you think the Flea Market changes in Escape from Tarkov are good? Let me know on the Insider Gaming Discord server what you‚Äôre thinking.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that MoreFun Studios mocked Battlestate Games

item.title: Zelda Movie Leaks Hint At First Major Actor Reveal
item.content:encoded:
New leaked set footage of The Legend of Zelda movie may show who is playing an iconic character in the franchise. Furthermore, it‚Äôs done by one of TV‚Äôs biggest stars from Severance.

With The Super Mario Bros. Movie in 2023 and the upcoming Super Mario Galaxy film, Nintendo is on quite a roll with films. Its blockbuster sales at the Box Office proved that bringing its IPs to theaters can work if done well. The company‚Äôs next project is a highly ambitious live-action adaptation of The Legend of Zelda. Directed by The Maze Runner‚Äôs Wes Ball, the film is set to release on May 7th, 2027. The film has cast Link and Zelda, but the rest of the cast has yet to be revealed. With filming underway, the process has been done and, with a new video leak, we may know who‚Äôs playing one of Zelda‚Äôs biggest supporters.

Severance Star May Be Playing Impa in The Legend of Zelda, Leak Hints 

In the leaked video on Instagram, a figure can be seen lecturing Zelda and granting her a sword. As we only know Link and Zelda‚Äôs actors, seeing a new person on set does indicate more has been added. With them lecturing Zelda, one could assume the character is Impa, Zelda‚Äôs Sheikan guardian. Given that some versions of the character can range in age, it seems the film could be taking notes from the younger version shown in Ocarina of Time and Hyrule Warriors. 

Still, fans on Reddit were quick to point out that the actress in the Legend of Zelda movie video leak looked strikingly familiar to Severance‚Äôs Dichen Lachman, who played counselor Ms. Casey in the popular Apple TV+ series. The actress has grown into a household name with Severance, as well as big roles in Neighbors, Jurassic World Dominion, and in the upcoming second season of Netflix‚Äô The Last Airbender. Interestingly enough, the actress did star in Wes Ball‚Äôs last film, Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes. Regardless, no official confirmation has been made on the casting, so take it and the leak with a grain of salt. However, if the fans‚Äô reactions are proof enough, the actress would be perfect as Impa.

What do you think of The Legend of Zelda movie leak? Think Dichen Lachman is Impa? Another character? What do you make of the leaks? Let us know in the comments and on the official Insider Gaming Discord!

For more Zelda news, check out our articles on the upcoming LEGO set and Nintendo‚Äôs plans to adapt other IPs. Make sure to subscribe to our weekly newsletter!

item.title: Concord Has Effectively Been Shut Down By Sony For A Second Time
item.content:encoded:
Concord has gone down in infamy as an all-time Sony and PlayStation blunder. It‚Äôs also understandable that the company wants to sweep the game‚Äôs existence under the rug, which is why Sony has presumably and swiftly issued DMCAs notices to gameplay videos of a fan-inspired Concord reboot, causing access to the game to be halted.

We don‚Äôt think much needs to be said about Concord at this point. The live-service shooter apparently cost over $400 million to develop, the team behind it was quickly shut down by Sony, and PlayStation took Concord offline within days of launch.

Now, a community effort to resurrect the game has been met with strong action.

Sony Issues DMCAs To Concord PC Revival

We reported on November 14 that Concord got a playable fan-made revival on PC. Users cleverly managed to get custom Concord servers up and running‚Äîrequiring special access to let you play.

What seemed like innocent fun has quickly turned into the gaze of Sony being cast upon them.

A dev post in the Concord Delta Discord updated everyone on a serious development:

‚ÄúDue to worrying legal action we‚Äôve decided to pause invites for the time being.‚Äù

It transpires that gameplay videos of the Concord project had made their way to YouTube. DMCA action was immediately imposed by MarkScan‚Äîa name that works a lot on Sony‚Äôs behalf. If you add the facts up, it‚Äôs fairly obvious to see what‚Äôs happened.

As a result, the Concord PC project and servers are on hold, and unless something drastic changes, it probably means Sony is once again responsible for the death of Concord.

Is it better that we all move on from Concord at this point? Or is it a shame to see a handful of people who cared about the short-lived shooter have their hard work up in flmaes? The Insider Gaming Discord Server is the perfect place to share your thoughts.

For more IG gaming news, check out Black Ops 7‚Äôs Day One Steam Numbers Comparing Badly To Battlefield 6 And ARC Raiders, and the First Legend of Zelda Movie Footage Leaking.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Season 1‚ÄîRelease Period, All New Maps, Zombies Content & More
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 begins another 12-month content crusade. New maps, guns, game modes, Operators, events, and all the usual hullabaloo that comes with a new CoD season. We have the latest Black Ops 7 Season 1 release information, as well as the known S1 content.

You could argue that this hasn‚Äôt been the most hyped CoD in history‚ÄîSteam player numbers would agree. Nevertheless, thousands of players have dived into Black Ops 7, meaning that Season 1 will have its fair share of recruits. If you want to know when BLOPS 7 Season 1 starts, read on for the crucial pointers.

Also, if you haven‚Äôt picked up the game yet, or you intend to, we have the cheapest way to buy Black Ops 7.

Expected Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 Release Date

We expect Black Ops 7 Season 1 to kick off on December 4, because it coincides with the end of Black Ops 6 Season 6‚ÄîSignaling the transition from Black Ops 6‚Äôs seasonal content ending and Black Ops 7‚Äôs beginning.

If you‚Äôve been in the live-service loop before, you know the drill. Once a previous season ends, the next one begins. BLOPS 7 has a brief period between launch and Season 1 called the ‚Äòpreseason‚Äô.

We know for sure that the legendary Nuketown map is a big addition in the preseason period. Once we cross this barrier, it‚Äôs time to move on to Season 1. Treyarch is likely to confirm the Season 1 start date in the coming days, but don‚Äôt be surprised to see December 4 as the official start date!

Expected Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season 1 Start Time

Again, based on existing data, Black Ops 7 Season 1 onlookers can expect the new season to begin around 9 AM PT.

This is a simple case of deduction using the end of the Black Ops 6 Season 6 Battle Pass. It‚Äôs what happens with all Call of Duty seasons, and we expect Season 1 to be no different.

If this isn‚Äôt the case, we‚Äôll update this hub and let you know of any confirmed times, delays, or changes.

All Black Ops 7 Season 1 Multiplayer & Zombies Content

Season 1 introduces a whopping 7 multiplayer maps, 7 weapons, remastered content, new multiplayer modes, new LTMs, Holiday season content, and 3 new Zombies maps.

Where do we begin? Let‚Äôs start with the Zombies content to mix it up.

New Black Ops 7 Season 1 Zombies Content

The Season 1 roadmap has confirmed that Astra Malorum is a new round-based Zombies map‚Äîto add to Ashes of the Damned‚Äîand there will also be two additional Survival maps.

We‚Äôve covered all of this and more in our complete Black Ops 7 Zombies hub.

Zombies fans will be satiated with flesh and fun for the foreseeable future, at least. Knowing Treyarch, there is probably the odd surprise here and there you‚Äôll need to uncover!

New Black Ops 7 Season 1 Multiplayer Content

The main course for most is the multiplayer content. A lot of maps are currently locked in for Season 1, adding to the 18 multiplayer maps that launched with the base game.

Here‚Äôs every confirmed map for Season 1 already:

  • Fate
  • Meltdown
  • Nuketown (Technically a preseason map)
  • Odysseus
  • Standoff (Remaster)
  • Utopia
  • Yakei

Additionally, 7 ‚Äúnew & fan-favorite weapons‚Äù are coming‚Äîincluding the Maddox from Black Ops 4‚Äîand we don‚Äôt quite know what the new game modes and extras entail.

Treyarch will reveal all when the time is right. Stay tuned for more updates on Season 1.

There‚Äôs no doubt that Treyarch is starting strong with Season 1. It‚Äôs being touted as the biggest season ever, and you can see why. There‚Äôs much more to come, and it‚Äôs the first of several BLOPS 7 seasons throughout the year. Tell us what you‚Äôre looking forward to the most in Season 1 and what you want to see after it through our Insider Gaming Official Discord Server.

Also, make sure you check out How to Weapon Prestige in Black Ops 7, How to Skip The Campaign To Play Endgame Mode, and How Long It Takes To Beat The Campaign.

item.title: Can You Delete Your Character in Where Winds Meet? Character Delection, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Where Winds Meet has finally launched worldwide after a long period of only being available in China, and if you‚Äôre keen to restart your journey at any point, we‚Äôve got the details on whether you can delete your character.

Where Winds Meet launched globally on November 14, 2025, after months of being exclusively available within China, and there‚Äôs a staggering amount of content to dig through in the Wuxia open-world adventure.

Regular RPG players will be well accustomed to starting over with a new character, which often requires choosing to delete your progress, and there are some limitations in Where Winds Meet, as we‚Äôve explained here.

Can You Delete Your Character in Where Winds Meet?

There is no option to delete your character in Where Winds Meet, unfortunately, so the process to start again is more lengthy.

While you can customize your character freely at any time from the pause menu, though some customizations, like changing hair color, require specific items, you can‚Äôt choose to wipe clean and start again with a click of the button.

Instead, the only way to start over is to create a new account in the game, and the only way to delete a character, as a result, is by deleting your account.

How to Delete Your Account in Where Winds Meet

If you want to delete your account, and therefore your character, in Where Winds Meet, the process is fairly straightforward.

However, it does require creating a new account in the game if you want to start your journey again, and you will lose everything you have earned.

Due to this, some in-game rewards may not be able to be claimed again, if they have already been revealed on your account. While you may be able to redeem them again with a new account, you may be stuck if the redemption is tied to your email address‚Äîunless you use an alternative.

Here‚Äôs the step-by-step process of how to delete your account in where Winds Meet.

  1. Open the game through the launcher.
  2. In the log-in screen, select the profile icon on the left-hand side to open log-in credentials.
  3. Click on the ‚ÄòAccount Deletion‚Äô option.
  4. On the webpage that pops up, click the checkbox to agree to the conditions stated, and click ‚ÄòNext.‚Äô
  5. Click ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô on the pop-up that appears.
  6. Fill in the steps to verify account ownership, and add your contact email.
  7. Click ‚ÄòYes‚Äô on the next pop-up.
  8. On the final page, check the box for the agreement, and hit ‚ÄòSubmit‚Äô to delete your account.

How are you finding Where Winds Meet? Let us know your thoughts on the game in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Where Winds Meet, check out all the Exchange Codes available for additional rewards, and find out all the multiplayer details for the game.
